description: Guernsey FC's fight against relegation from Isthmian League South Central gets a huge boost as they beat fellow strugglers Metropolitan Police 2-0.
title: Guernsey FC beat Metropolitan Police 2-0 in crucial win in fight against relegation
title_page: Guernsey FC beat Metropolitan Police 2-0 in crucial win in fight against relegation - BBC Sport
